mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_ID AS empId , CONCAT(FIRST_NAME, ' ' || LAST_NAME) AS empName , CONCAT(E.EMAIL, '@emp.com') AS email , J.JOB_TITLE AS jobName , J.JOB_ID AS jobId , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS deptName , D.DEPARTMENT_ID AS deptId FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN JOBS J ON E.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE E.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{empId} AND E.DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId} AND E.FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} AND E.LAST_NAME = #{lastName}
